array.name: fortunes_array
array.item: Why are you asking ME questions? Are you that desperate?
It is YOUR fault
Your life is without meaning or purpose
You will die sad and alone
\"The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool.\" You are the fool.
You are beyond earthly redemption. Your only hope is to seek God
Did your parents have ANY children they loved?
When you die, your children will care more about the money than about you
It\'s hopeless. Why even bother?
Your struggle is pointless. Give in to your desires
The end will come sooner than you think
Nobody will come to bear your pall
Scissors. 61.
Yes, but there\'s always a price to pay...
No.
An apparent good thing will ultimately turn out bad
Nobody loves you. You loser.
I feel bad for your dog
A true friend is a gift from God. Since God doesn\'t exist, guess what? Neither do true friends.
You will be betrayed by someone you trust
Execute order 66.
Life—the way it really is—is a battle not between good and bad, but between bad and worse
\"In the depths of my heart I can’t help being convinced that my dear fellow-men, with a few exceptions, are worthless.\" You are not the exception.
